title: Labour: We’ll ‘unashamedly champion’ financial services as party plots rulebook reform
description: Conservative ministers have similarly pushed ahead with regulatory reform efforts to try and revive the UK’s appeal as a financial centre. City minister Bim Afolami told City A.M.’s Bonds & Ballots series last week the government was looking to spur a ...

title: Argentina Court Rules Milei’s Labor Reform Unconstitutional
description: (Bloomberg) -- An Argentine court ruled that the labor reform President Javier Milei tried to implement through decree is unconstitutional, the latest blow to his plans to overhaul South America’s second-largest economy. Most Read from Bloomberg Musk ...

title: Council President Sara Nelson Opposes Effort to Increase Voter Turnout
description: Seattle City Council President Sara Nelson, ever out of sync with local Democrats, expressed “real strong concern” for a pair of bills in the Legislature that would give jurisdictions the option to switch their local elections from odd to even years, a reform that passed with overwhelming support in a 2022 King County ballot initiative.

title: Argentinian court overturns Milei’s labour rules in blow to his reform plans
description: An Argentine court on Tuesday overturned labour rules proposed by President Javier Milei that would make it easier to sack workers, in a new blow to the leader’s efforts to shake up regulations that he says have hampered the country’s struggling ...

title: Labour-led town halls favouring foreign nationals for social housing over Brits, reveals data

title: Ross-shire community councils reform – with elections triggered for two
description: FOUR Ross-shire community councils which had fallen into abeyance have reformed after a call for candidates. And there will potentially be an election to two others– Nigg and Shandwick and Dornie and District– after more nominations than vacancies ...

title: Reform UK will be ready for general election, Tice says
description: Reform UK leader Richard Tice says his party will be ready for a general election and urged Labour to stand aside, as he claims he did for the Conservatives in 2019.
